name: Jackalope
description: Jackalope is a mostly sativa strain that crosses Chocolope and Black Jack in a flavorful combination of berry and chocolate confection. Jack Herer ancestry reveals itself through this strain's energized and happy effects, which slowly taper down to mellow relaxation over time.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Aroused, Sleepy, Talkative, Depression, Insomnia, Stress, Fatigue, Headaches, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Headache
